data.strTitle: Covid-19 tally reaches 375 with two death
data.strDesc: Nepal Coronavirus: 375 Cases and 2 Death. As per the recent data provided by worldometer corona. New infected victims added today = 18.

data.strTitle: Nepal extends lockdown until June 2 amid growing COVID-19 cases with two deaths
data.strDesc: A Cabinet meeting held at the Prime Minister's Official Residence in Baluwatar took the decision to continue the lockdown. The lockdown which was first enforced in the country on March 24 was coming to an end on Monday midnight, May 18. The government on Sunday decided to extend the nationwide lockdown until June 2.
Nepal Coronavirus: 357 Cases and 2 Deaths. As per the recent data provided by worldometer corona . New infected victims added today = 62.

data.strTitle: Nepal Tourism Board seeks Rs 20 billion fund to pay furloughed workers
data.strDesc: The Nepal Tourism Board has asked the government to set up a Rs20 billion coronavirus job retention fund to partially pay the salaries of furloughed tourism workers.
Nepal Coronavirus: 295 Cases and 2 Death. As per the recent data provided by worldometer corona. New infected victims added today = 14

data.strTitle: Covid-19 tally reaches 281 with one death, the first in the country
data.strDesc: The Health Ministry said late Saturday that a 29-year-old woman from Barhabise in Sindhupalchok who died on the way to Dhulikhel Hospital was the first Covid-19 fatality in the country.The two other cases are from Dhanushaâ€“both men aged 20 and 65.
